00253 class CompareCosineNode
00254 {
00255  public:
00256 
00257   // Comparison function for construction of priority queue.
00258   bool operator() (const CosineTree* a, const CosineTree* b) const
00259   {
00260     return a->L2Error() < b->L2Error();
00261   }
00262 };
